body: I don't know how to read Japanese but I'll try my best to summarize the story based on my experience. This is about a married couple and the husband was barren. He wanted to have children so he let the other guy impregnate his wife. There were multiple attempts where the first ones failed. First, it was long range shot. Next is contact. Next is insertion. Next is full blown sex. After that is obvious, it was the wife getting into the other man and had sex with him while the other man's wife fell in love with the barren man but still wanted to have sex with her husband. Repeat yada yada normal NTR story then end. The other stories after the first ones are obvious, no need to explain.

English translations please! 
English translations please!
Masterpiece level but I want a sequel with the daughters and wives/mother's while the MC is helpless watching all 4 with the guy. Great art.
Si in the end the father fuck his daughters ???
Only idiots would compare porn situations to real life
@KevinnKnight it's a hentai dude. leave it be!
I enjoy reading ntr, but its so fake and unrealistic how the husband/boyfriend act. Nobody in there right mind will just sit there and cry while "rubbing one off" as there lover is being used...
